name: GoldFund
description: The GoldFund business ecosystem comprises of a commodities trading platform that sells Gold. The gold is reportedly obtained directly from Gold Mining Companies. GoldFund intends to loan capital to near term gold producers and that is repaid in Gold. The Gold is reportedly sold on its gold commodities exchange, and GFUN token holders would then be able to use their GFUN token to obtain a discount on the purchase of physical gold.
